kss-node Styleguide

  • 0.0: Overview
  • 1.0: Icons
  • 2.0: Colored Icons

2.0 - Colored Icons

Change the color of an icon with CSS

2.1 - The apml colored-icon

Default styling

the icon-apml-colored icon

.icon-apml-colored

 
<i class="icon-apml-colored"></i>
